# Preface {.unnumbered}

## Structure of the book {-}

The book is broken down into small sections that aim to demonstrate a single concept at a time. Chapter \@ref(introduction) introduces the basic components of R, and how you can assign values to variables. This book is a work in progress. Submit any issues  [here](https://https://github.com/IAA-Faculty/statistical_foundations/issues). Please check back for frequent updates.
